query:
SELECT poi.productId, p.sku, COUNT(*) as lineCount, SUM(poi.requestedQuantity) as totalQty
FROM pickingOrders po
JOIN pickingOrderItems poi ON po.id = poi.pickingOrderId
JOIN products p ON poi.productId = p.id
WHERE po.customerOrderNumber = 'PED-005'
GROUP BY poi.productId, p.sku
ORDER BY p.sku;

JOIN products p ON poi.productId = p.id
